title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.28 - Marijuana; controlled substances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.28 - Marijuana; controlled substances

State Regulations

No person shall bring, possess, distribute, sell, solicit or
consume marijuana or any controlled substance, as defined in ยง 220.00 of the

New York State Penal Law, in any park or other park property or
facility. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
